title: Poland: the land and the people
brief_description: A geographical and historical view of Poland and her people in 1961. Poland’s place in the world as a nation under communism. Life on a small farmily farm and in mining and industrial regions; Poland’s efforts at industrial diversification; the role of Poland in international trade.
